about_the_game:
Embark on a tranquil journey through the world of blossoms and showcase your puzzle-solving prowess with House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Flowers DLC. From the sun-drenched gardens to the secret groves, immerse yourself in the world of floral wonders and let your skills bloom! Prepare for a puzzle-solving adventure that celebrates the unparalleled beauty of flowers in a way that is truly unforgettable.

This DLC adds a burst of natural splendor to the House of Jigsaw universe, challenging you to test your puzzle-solving prowess in a garden of vibrant hues! Can you solve the flower jigsaws in the shortest amount of time? Show your results on the community page.



  • Enjoy the beauty of blossoms
  • Multiple puzzle selection
  • Cutouts up to 1000 pieces
  • Different edge cutouts
  • Change background color
  • Incredible zoom
  • Compare your time score with players on the community page
